commit message: Only try to set various network info if there is an active wifi connection, otherwise let the user know there isnt

Now that we are using the broadcast receiver to dtetct when a network connection was established or lost we dont want to cache any of the system network infomation. Added a few new internal and public methods to support this new functionality
Make use of the broadcast receiver for detecting when a network connection is lost or re-established. Update the UI appropriately for either case and handle and additional life cycle event
